content: Shoreham Harbour Lifeboat Station is an RNLI station located in the town of Shoreham-by-Sea in the English county of West Sussex in the United Kingdom. It underwent extensive re-development in 2010 with a new purpose built boathall to accommodate its new Tamar-class all-weather lifeboat. It operates two lifeboats. The AWB lifeboat is called RNLB Enid Collett (ON 1295) and the Inshore lifeboat is a D-class (IB1) called RNLB Joan Woodland (D-784).
